body_html:
However I wonder why the {% raw %} is in the markdown in the first place. If I understand the code snippets correctly, it actually does not belong there. When I remove it from the markdown completely, everything looks good.

It breaks GitHub page generation, because it's interpreted as a Jekyll directive
http://tesoriere.com/2010/08/25/liquid-code-in-a-liquid-template-with-jekyll/

On GitBook it won't be rendered, sadly it will show up in GitHub.
